name: Shravan Kumar Singh
body:
### About me
I am a PhD student at the [Department of Computer Science and Engineering](http://cse.iitkgp.ac.in/), [Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur](http://iitkgp.ac.in/) starting from January, 2018. I am working under the supervision of [Prof. Niloy Ganguly](http://www.facweb.iitkgp.ernet.in/~niloy/). My research interest lies in Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, analysis of Online Social Network(OSN). I am a part of [Complex Network Group](http://www.cnergres.iitkgp.ac.in/).

### Academic Details
I have received my M.Tech in Computer Science and Eng. from [Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur], India in the year of 2018.

### Support or Contact
Email Address: shan.icwa[AT]gmail[DOT]com
